interface.name: EAP_uiDynamicGridDisplay
interface.description: Interface to populate the read only grid dynamically with the columns and data.

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: { { displayName:"Group", entityColumnName:"GRP", uiEntityMappingId:1, displayType:"TEXT", displayFormat:null, decimalPoints:null }, { displayName:"Branch", entityColumnName:"BRANCH", uiEntityMappingId:1, displayType:"TEXT", displayFormat:null, decimalPoints:null }, { displayName:"Amount", entityColumnName:"AMOUNT", uiEntityMappingId:1, displayType:"DOLLAR", displayFormat:null, decimalPoints:5 }, { displayName:"Date Opened", entityColumnName:"dateOpened", uiEntityMappingId:1, displayType:"DATE", displayFormat:"MM/DD/YYYY", decimalPoints:5 } }
